# Notebooks Endpoints

SQL notebooks, sessions, jobs, and Git integration.

## `GET /git-repos`

List registered Git repositories

Returns a paginated list of registered Git repositories.

- Operation ID: `listGitRepos`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of Git repositories |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /git-repos`

Register a Git repository

Registers a new Git repository for notebook sync.

- Operation ID: `createGitRepo`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `201` | Created Git repository |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `409` | The resource already exists or conflicts with current state. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /git-repos/{gitRepoId}`

Get a Git repository

Retrieves the details of a registered Git repository.

- Operation ID: `getGitRepo`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gitRepoId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the Git repository. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Git repository details |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /git-repos/{gitRepoId}/sync`

Trigger Git sync

Pulls latest changes from the Git repository and syncs notebooks.

- Operation ID: `syncGitRepo`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gitRepoId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the Git repository. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Git sync result |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /notebooks`

List notebooks

Returns a paginated list of notebooks.

- Operation ID: `listNotebooks`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `owner` | `string` | `false` | Filter by owner principal name. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated list of notebooks |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /notebooks/{notebookId}/sessions`

| --- | --- | --- | --- |

## `DELETE /notebooks/{notebookId}/sessions/{sessionId}`

Close a notebook session

Closes the session and releases the DuckDB connection.

- Operation ID: `closeNotebookSession`

| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `notebookId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the notebook. |

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |

| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /notebooks/{notebookId}/sessions/{sessionId}/execute/{cellId}`

Execute a single cell in a session

Runs the cell's SQL through the RBAC/RLS pipeline on the pinned connection.

- Operation ID: `executeCell`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `cellId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the cell. |
| `notebookId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the notebook. |
| `sessionId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the session. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Cell execution result |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /notebooks/{notebookId}/sessions/{sessionId}/run-all`

Execute all SQL cells in order (synchronous)

Executes all SQL cells in the notebook sequentially on the pinned connection.

- Operation ID: `runAllCells`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `notebookId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the notebook. |
| `sessionId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the session. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Run-all result |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /notebooks/{notebookId}/sessions/{sessionId}/run-all-async`

Start async execution of all cells

Starts asynchronous execution of all SQL cells in the notebook.

- Operation ID: `runAllCellsAsync`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `notebookId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the notebook. |
| `sessionId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the session. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `202` | Accepted notebook job |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
